name: Lode Runner On-Line: The Mad Monks' Revenge
name_original: Lode Runner On-Line: The Mad Monks' Revenge
description:
Lode Runner On-Line: The Mad Monks' Revenge is an arcade game developed by Jeff Tunnell Productions and Presage Software. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Sierra On-Line.
Lode Runner On-Line: The Mad Monks' Revenge is available on PC.
